FuncDef: Configures an Ethernet 802.2 LLC DSAP value or range for a MAC filter match criterion.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the 8-bit dsap match criteria value which can be expressed in decimal integer, hexadecimal or binary format. Values-0 to 255.
Specifies an optional parameter that may be used when specifying a range of dsap values to use as the match criteria. Values-0 to 255. ParamDefault: Default- 255 (exact match)0x00 to 0xFF
